mapper.select:
select count(*) from wuliu_member_vehicle a left join wuliu_vehicle_driver b on a.memberid = b.creator and a.vehicleid = b.vehicleid
and a.memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.vehicletypename like "%"#{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or a.vehicleprefix like "%"#{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or a.vehicleno like "%"#{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
or a.vehicleprefix like "%"#{searchfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or a.vehicleno like "%"#{searchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and b.drivername like "%" #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and b.drivertel like "%" #{drivertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and a.vehicleprefix like "%" #{vehiprefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and a.vehicleno like "%" #{vehino,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and a.vehicletype = #{vehitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.vehilength like "%" #{vehilength,jdbcType=DOUBLE} "%"
